intro: Outside my lab, I like to touch some grass, see some people and feel the nature. Life is Fun !!!!

reading.title: Klara and the Sun
reading.author: Kazuo Ishiguro
reading.description: A poignant exploration of artificial intelligence and what it means to be human.

reading.title: The Overstory
reading.author: Richard Powers
reading.description: Changed how I think about trees and our relationship with the natural world.

reading.title: The Code Breaker
reading.author: Walter Isaacson
reading.description: A fascinating dive into CRISPR, gene editing, and the scientists behind these advancements.

reading.title: Sapiens
reading.author: Yuval Noah Harari
reading.description: A thought-provoking journey through human history.
